metadata.name: Keeper's Balls
metadata.description:
# Keeper's Balls ## A mod for The Binding of Isaac: Repentance, by machasins
This mod simply plays a vine boom sound and the narrartor saying 'Balls' whenever Isaac encounters "Keeper's Sack".
Thanks to Lazy Mattman for inspiration and [BluePipe](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2491837386) for sound effects.
